name: DAYTA Marketing
description:
DAYTA is a digital marketing company based in Central Minnesota, representing brands across the country. Our mission is to be an irreplaceable partner for our clients by redefining marketing partnerships. 
We believe great digital marketing requires a singularly dedicated team. Our team partners with businesses to exceed the demands of social marketing with time, diligence, and consistency.
The rubber meets the road when our people, our processes, and our technology face the real business opportunities our clients bring to us. Digital communication is constantly evolving and tactical thinking quickly becomes overwhelming. When used strategically, digital marketing is a business solution with four key facets: brand awareness, brand reputation, customer engagement, and recruitment marketing. These facets together provide a foundational approach to digital marketing. By analyzing our clients’ opportunities and strategically applying the facets of digital marketing, we are able to help our clients accomplish their goals.
Specialties: Brand Awareness, Customer Engagement, Reputation Management, Recruitment Marketing, Social Media Management, Digital Advertising, Search Marketing, Web Design, and Graphic Design.
